name: Gate 02 — DIMKUR · KA · ZI-NA-AN-NA
description: From the Measures of Inanna series (Volume I). Gate 02 is the Gate of the Lapis Necklace — the surrender of adornment, beauty, and symbolic status. Here, Inanna releases what once reflected her radiance outward, reclaiming the deeper light that cannot be worn. DIMKUR · KA · ZI-NA-AN-NA marks the offering of identity’s embellishments, the loosening of self-presentation, and the remembering of inner brilliance. This plate witnesses the soft unbinding where elegance becomes essence.

attributes.value: The Gate of the Lapis Necklace
